Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Safety Critical
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Communication Suite component.
Inspection revealed damage to critical components.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: D - Due to features inherent in the design
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 30/04/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy
